```{r, message=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************                Library                       *************** #
# **************************************************************************** #
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(fuzzyjoin)
library(dplyr)
library(sjmisc)
library(data.table)
library(questionr)
library(gtsummary)
library(gt)
library(labelled)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}

# pe_codes: import icd-code information (1:1 structure)
source("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/code/utils/params.R")

# delivery_final_v8: import linked delivery data (1:1 structure)
load("~/ehr-preeclampsia-model/data/processed/delivery_linked_v9.rda")

```

```{r}
#gather list of all baby IDs in final dataset

data_table1=delivery_final_v9
table1_baby=data_table1$baby_id

##add mom ID onto deidentified baby ID
baby_mom_at_birth_with_payer$Deidentified_baby_ID<-paste0("baby-", baby_mom_at_birth_with_payer$Deidentified_baby_ID)

#filter whole dataset for moms in final dataset
characteristics=baby_mom_at_birth_with_payer%>%
  filter(Deidentified_baby_ID %in% table1_baby)

```

```{r, message=FALSE}
#Mean materna age
mean_ma<-mean(characteristics$`Age at Encounter_mom`, trim=0.3)
sd_ma<-sd(characteristics$`Age at Encounter_mom`)

#gravidity
mean_gravidity<-mean(delivery_final_v9$gravidity, trim=0.3)
sd_gravidity<-sd(delivery_final_v9$gravidity)

#parity
mean_parity<-mean(delivery_final_v9$parity, trim=0.3)
sd_parity<-sd(delivery_final_v9$parity)

#Gestational age days
delivery_final_v9$ga_weeks<-as.numeric(delivery_final_v9$weeks)*7
delivery_final_v9$days[is.na(delivery_final_v9$days)] = 0
delivery_final_v9$ga_weeks<-delivery_final_v9$ga_weeks+as.numeric(delivery_final_v9$days)
mean_ga<-mean(delivery_final_v9$ga_weeks, trim=0.3)
sd_parity<-sd(delivery_final_v9$ga_weeks)

#time to deliver
mean_ttd<-mean(as.numeric(delivery_final_v9$time_to_deliver, trim=0.3))
sd_ttd<-sd(as.numeric(delivery_final_v9$time_to_deliver))


```

```{r}
#Race and Ethnicity
dat.race=characteristics%>%
  select(Ethnicity_mom, Race_mom)%>%
  as_tibble()

dat_label=dat.race
var_label(dat_label) <-list(Ethnicity_mom = "Ethnicity", 
                            Race_mom = "Race")

theme_gtsummary_compact()
dat_label%>%
  tbl_summary()%>%
  as_gt()%>%
  tab_header(title="Race and Ethnicity")

```

```{r}
#Number of fetuses
delivery_final_v9$multgest_dx_subcategory[is.na(delivery_final_v9$multgest_dx_subcategory)] = "0"

delivery_final_v9=delivery_final_v9%>%
  mutate(multgest_dx_subcategory=recode_factor(multgest_dx_subcategory,
                                               "twin" = "2",
                                               "triplet" = "3",
                                               "quadruplet" = "4",
                                               "multiple" = "1"))


mean_multiple<-mean(as.numeric(delivery_final_v9$multgest_dx_subcategory))
sd_multiple<-sd(as.numeric(delivery_final_v9$multgest_dx_subcategory))

```

```{r}
#Comorbidities
dat.comor=delivery_final_v9%>%
  select(IllegalDrugUserStatusSourceNo, IllegalDrugUserStatusSourceYes, IllegalDrugUserStatusSourceNever, past_pe)%>%
  as_tibble()

dat_label=dat.comor%>%
  select(-mom_id)

var_label(dat_label) <-list(IllegalDrugUserStatusSourceNo = "No drug", 
                            IllegalDrugUserStatusSourceYes = "Yes drug",
                            IllegalDrugUserStatusSourceNever = "Never drug",
                            past_pe = "History of PE")
                            

theme_gtsummary_compact()
dat_label%>%
  tbl_summary()%>%
  as_gt()%>%
  tab_header(title="Comorbidities")

```
